# SecretManagerKey constructor

Represents a key for storing a secret.

```csharp
public SecretManagerKey(string Category, string Identifier)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| Category | The secret's category, uniquely identifying the type of secret within Studio Pro across all extensions. |
| Identifier | A unique identifier within the category. |
